name: Vidar
description: In the middle of a blizzard, a community's remaining citizens are forced to confront their impending deaths. Every night, a villager is killed, and the survivors are forced to alter their course in response. Every game creates a new, randomized story just for you.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Core i5 equivalent or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 800 x 450 pixels or higher desktop resolution DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Memory: 2 GB RAM
